page.title: 12BEFORE AND AFTER SCHOOL!
page.content: Children in{Doulting, Cranmore, {Chesterblade,}and{Dean}can go to either{Doulting School, Evercreech {School}or to{St. Paul's School}in {Shepton Mallet.}When they are too young to go to school there is a{Tots {and Toddlers}group at Doulting School on Wednesdays after school. At Cranmore Village Hall there is Playgroup on Tuesday and Thursday mornings for children just before they go to school. Children who go to school can join the Brownies or Cub Scouts. There aren't any of these in Cranmore or Doulting. If the boys want to join the Cubs they can go to {Oakhill}or{Stoke St. Michael}or {Shepton Mallet.}After that they can join the Guides or Scouts at{Shepton {Mallet}when they are old enough. There is sometimes a{Youth Club}at Doulting on Mondays.
